title: Limoncello sponge cake
ingredients: ['For the cake', '450g (16 oz) golden caster sugar', '450g (16 oz) Stork® or butter, softened', '8 eggs, at room temperature', '2 tablespoons limoncello liqueur', '450g (16 oz) self raising flour', 'For the buttercream', '450g (16 oz) icing sugar', '170g (6 oz) Stork® or butter, softened', 'a few drops yellow food colouring', '2 tablespoons limoncello liqueur']
